title: OpenCode Remote Config Configuration
description: Configuration for the remote-config plugin that syncs skills, agents, commands, plugins, and instructions from Git repositories

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

repositories.description: List of Git repositories to sync skills, agents, commands, plugins, and instructions from

sync.description: Sync mode: 'blocking' waits for sync before OpenCode is ready, 'background' syncs asynchronously

repository.description: Configuration for a single Git repository

url.description: Git URL (SSH or HTTPS). Examples: git@github.com:org/repo.git, https://github.com/org/repo.git

ref.description: Git ref to checkout (branch, tag, or commit SHA). Defaults to repository's default branch

skills.description: Skills to import. Use '*' for all skills, or an array of skill names

oneOf.description: Import all skills from the repository
List of specific skill names to import

agents.description: Agents to import. Use '*' for all agents, or an array of agent names

oneOf.description: Import all agents from the repository
List of specific agent names to import

commands.description: Commands (slash commands) to import. Use '*' for all commands, or an array of command names

oneOf.description: Import all commands from the repository
List of specific command names to import

plugins.description: Plugins (hook files) to import. Use '*' for all plugins, or an array of plugin names. Plugins must be self-contained (no local imports).

oneOf.description: Import all plugins from the repository
List of specific plugin names to import

instructions.description: Instructions to import from manifest.json. Use '*' for all instructions, or an array of instruction names (relative paths as defined in manifest.json)

oneOf.description: Import all instructions from the repository's manifest.json
List of specific instruction names to import
